response.homeDescription: Coming on the market soon! Rare opportunity to own a modern masterpiece in Hyde Park. A home created with the thoughtful combination of modern design, green technologies, and highest quality products. Prime location, dramatic open spaces, minimal maintenance, warm textures, plus huge tax and utility savings! One of the first Platinum LEED Certified remodeled homes in the area, which saves you over $240,000 in taxes during the 10 year abatement. Sustainable design elements include: geothermal heating/cooling, drought tolerant landscaping, closed cell insulation, water harvesting system, local products, thermory wood cladding/decking, high efficiency hot water, and located in a walkable/bikable community! Whether you have a culinary passion and like to entertain, looking for a place for your artwork to shine, or prefer a stress-free lifestyle....this home has it all. 4,200 square feet of space, 2 car garage, and amazing views from the third floor balcony!
